item.ji_yue_boss.bone_blade.tooltip:
Right-click to select a target to teleport to its side
Left-click to cause %d fixed damage to enemy who are out of battle
item.ji_yue_boss.folding_fan.tooltip: Right-click to fan out a whirlwind to repel the enemy
item.ji_yue_boss.gourd.tooltip:
Automatically fill the halo plum water every 30 seconds
Recover 6 health after drinking and get a buff randomly
item.ji_yue_boss.jade_lantern.tooltip: Right click to eliminate all your buffs, and restore %d hearts to yourself and other players within %d blocks with yourself as the center
item.ji_yue_boss.qixiao.tooltip: Press shift+right button to draw the sword
item.ji_yue_boss.sabre.tooltip: After right-clicking to select a target, summon a huge flying sword above it, causing range damage
item.ji_yue_boss.savour.tooltip: Right-click to replenish %d arrows in the inventory and obtain damage absorption for 5 seconds
item.ji_yue_boss.unsheathed_qixiao.toolt: Press shift+right button to retract the sword\nPress the right button while sprinting to sprint and slash\nPress the right button at the moment of the enemy's attack to bounce back
msg.ji_yue_boss.all_characters_reset: All character selections have been reset
msg.ji_yue_boss.amon_boss.death: How terrifying... Let's not meet again, please.
msg.ji_yue_boss.amon_boss.hurt.2: Stay calm. I mean you no harm.
msg.ji_yue_boss.amon_boss.hurt.3: How disappointing. I believed we were allies.
msg.ji_yue_boss.amon_boss.hurt.4: Surrender the journal, and all you desire shall be yours.
msg.ji_yue_boss.character_not_found: There is no character with ID %s
msg.ji_yue_boss.character_set: The character selected by %s has been set to %s
msg.ji_yue_boss.character_set_failed: %s cannot select %s, the character has been selected
msg.ji_yue_boss.invalid_character_select: %s has selected %s, but it is not a valid character
screen.character_selection.confirm_selec: Are you sure you want to choose %s?
screen.inventory.get_items: Click to get exclusive primary items for selected characters
